tika-s0402t48:0_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
tika-s0402t48:1_0: Next there are ten kinds of appearance, praise, and color.
tika-s0402t48:2_0: Right away he shall apply himself to the first absorption, thinking,
tika-s0402t48:3_0: The Yet of the Hots is finished.
tika-s0402t48:5_1: Such is the ultimate goal of ignorance, but not to develop the seven treasures. Let them not pass away from that host of skillful qualities in that teaching. Being they’re lost in that teaching.’
tika-s0402t48:5_2: Because at time the wrong time, skillful qualities are produced by you, and despise of destitute and pass away.
tika-s0402t48:5_3: The eighth shallow is shall be stilled.
tika-s0402t48:7_0: The Book of the Ones is finished.
tika-s0402t48:8_0: The third group of nine is finished.
tika-s0402t48:9_0: The fourth group of nine is finished.
